B

BINInputStream - Class in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io
Class implementing a specialized InputStream which handles binary transmitted messages.
BINInputStream(InputStream) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BINInputStream
Constructs a new BINInputStream instance reading from the given InputStream.
BINOutputStream - Class in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io
Class implementing a specialized OutputStream which duplicates bytes written to the stream that resemble a frame token.
BINOutputStream(OutputStream) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BINOutputStream
Constructs a new BINOutputStream instance writing to the given OutputStream.
bitIndex(int) - Method in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.util.BitVector
Returns the index of the given bit in the byte where it it stored.
BitVector - Class in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.util
Class that implements a collection for bits, storing them packed into bytes.
BitVector(int) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.util.BitVector
Constructs a new BitVector instance with a given size.
buf - Variable in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.FastByteArrayInputStream

buf - Variable in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.FastByteArrayOutputStream

bump(int) - Method in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.FastByteArrayOutputStream
 
bumpLen - Variable in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.FastByteArrayOutputStream
Increment of the output buffer size on overflow.
byteIndex(int) - Method in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.util.BitVector
Returns the index of the byte in the the byte array that contains the given bit.
BytesInputStream - Class in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io
Class implementing a byte array input stream with a DataInput interface.
BytesInputStream(int) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BytesInputStream
Constructs a new BytesInputStream instance, with an empty buffer of a given size.
BytesInputStream(byte[]) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BytesInputStream
Constructs a new BytesInputStream instance, that will read from the given data.
byteSize() - Method in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.util.BitVector
Returns the number of bytes used to store the collection of bits as int.
BytesOutputStream - Class in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io
Class implementing a byte array output stream with a DataInput interface.
BytesOutputStream(int) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BytesOutputStream
Constructs a new BytesOutputStream instance with a new output buffer of the given size.
BytesOutputStream(byte[]) - Constructor for class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.BytesOutputStream
